family.name: Tower Controller
family.comment: The TowerController Mark-II is normally programmed in OPs mode

label.text: JMRI 3.7.4 or later is required to use this definition.
A new unit address will only be active after power cycling the TC Mark II.

display.tooltip: Not required if there is a command station attached
display.label: Master Mode

display.tooltip: Remembers state of layout during power down
Reports sensor and output states at GPON
